title: Open new rhino file with python script
question:
Hi everyone,


Does anyone know how to start a new rhino file when I run the script.

so first thing I want the script to do is to create a new file without asking if I want to save the file already open and with no template for the new file.


this is because when I run the script in for testing I always need to open a new file to clear everything (layers, history, etc)


thanks so much

Francisco

code_blocks.code:
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

#Note - this will close the document without saving!!
rs.DocumentModified(False)
rs.Command("_-New _None")
code_blocks.author: Helvetosaur
